name: Roots of All Evil (ItsLewisKnowles, Luckziee, Patr839, FloraTheGhost, Harry Tyler)
name_original: Roots of All Evil (ItsLewisKnowles, Luckziee, Patr839, FloraTheGhost, Harry Tyler)
description:
Farm, purchase and kill? Prepare yourselves, the killer vegetables have unrooted!

It's time to reconnect with nature and become grounded in the farming life. Purchase suspicious seeds from a shady old man in your shed, plant them and gear up, because when night falls, you'll wish you were.

Be ready for a whole new take on a wave survival, how far can you get?


How to Play

Run to the shack to buy suspicious  seeds from a shady old man

Plant them in the various crop plots

Go back home and get some sleep - It's been a long day

Repeat! The life of a farmer is so mundane

Note: The beetroot gives health instead of snail shells!

Controls

WASD MoveMouseLookE InteractLeft-ClickAttack
